text: Antony and Cleopatra is a 1908 American silent drama movie based on the play by Shakespeare. It was directed by J. Stuart Blackton and Charles KentANTONY AND CLEOPATRAAlan Goble. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film and stars Maurice Costello, Florence Lawrence, and William V. Ranous. ==Actors== * Maurice Costello as Mark Antony * Florence Lawrence: Cleopatra * William V. Ranous: Octavius Caesar * Betty Kent: Cleopatra * William Phillips: Octavius Caesar * Charles Chapman: Mark Antony ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies set in Ancient Rome Category:Movies set in the 1st century BC Category:Movies based on plays by William Shakespeare
title: Antony and Cleopatra (1908 movie)
